name: Haunted Mine (FallingBear)
description:
You are alone in abandoned mine, trying to stay alive.

The idea behind this game is you control a player that is trying to survive in a hostile mine shaft, constantly running out of health, fighting enemies. Player would collect resources and sell it for better equipment.

-- Controls --

Arrow keys / WASD : Move

Space : Jump

Left click/hold : Dig

-- Tools --

IDE: Unity/C#

Graphic : MS Paint

Audio : sfxr

This is Post Compo version of Haunted Mine, Hopefully a made the game playable and I would like to add move features in upcomming updates (Monster, Items, better collision system).
